description: I use this with Emudeck, it's good, but can be better. I find the UI lacks decent contrast, ie the side menu blends with everything so I wasn't sure which category I chose. Not sure if this is attributed to this app, but sometimes there isn't any different artwork for sequels. Also games with over 1 disc have the same artwork so it can be confusing.

Great little tool to import your non-Steam games to your Steam database and include artwrk so that it's not just a 'grey box'.
Found it fairly cnofusing at first and didn't quite understand the flow of operations i.e. setup a parser, generate app list, save app list. But watched a short YouTube vid on using it and it all made sense. The built in configs are really helpful once you understand what you need to enter for the various variables and the included guidance helps a lot with that.
